chapter.title: Drools FIPA Agents OSGI Merged Bundle

section.title: Introduction
section.para: The OSGI Merged Bundle is being used to create a single merged bundle containing ACL, CORE and UTILS under the same bundle. This allow us to get a single bundle that can be deployed in any OSGI container to manage the CORE, ACL and UTILS version to simplify the deployment.
The following sections will introduce the most important entities described inside this module as well as some helpers which were included here to keep the project structure simple.
